snippet: The fourth Hangout in our London 2012 series included the U.S. Olympic marathon runner Ryan Hall, The Times’s Jason Stallman and Jeré Longman, and David Willey, Editor-in-Chief of Runner’s World magazine.
abstract: The fourth Hangout in our London 2012 series included the U.S. Olympic marathon runner Ryan Hall, The Times’s Jason Stallman and Jeré Longman, and David Willey, Editor-in-Chief of Runner’s World magazine.

headline.main: Video: Google+ Hangout With Marathon Runner Ryan Hall
